data.title: Gauhati University Distance Education Admission 2024

data.text:
Gauhati University Distance Education Admission 2024: Admission at Gauhati University for PG-level programs through distance mode is open for the academic session 2024-25. Students who are eagerly waiting to get allotted to this program shall apply before the expected deadline of 24 August 2024. For any course offered by the IODL, a candidate needs to meet the basic eligibility criteria. University accepts admission for distance education on a merit basis. Candidates are required to fill out an online application through the website of Gauhati University @gucdoe.in. Students are suggested to read the guidelines or procedure of admission before filling out the online application form.

Gauhati University Distance Education Admission

Founded in the year 1948, Gauhati University is a public state university situated in Guwahati, Assam. The university is a member of the AIU (Association of Indian Universities) and the ACU (Association of Commonwealth Universities). The Gauhati University Centre for Distance and Online Education (GUCDOE), previously known as the Institute of Distance and Open Learning (IDOL) was established in 1998. Currently, for the session 2024-25, the university offers 39 postgraduate courses in several specializations. Distance courses offered at the university are recognized by the UGC-DEB. Additionally, the NAAC (National Assessment and Accreditation Council) has accredited an A+ grade to the university.

GU Distance Education Highlights:

University Name Gauhati University Mode of Education Distance Education Program Offered Postgraduate Application Process Online Mode of Learning Online Type of University Public State University Established 1998 University website @gucdoe.in. Registration Fee INR 550

Gauhati University Distance Education Admission Process 2024

Gauhati University offers admission for all postgraduate courses based on the marks scored in the qualifying examination. Gauhati University is offering admission for the session 2024-25 and students can apply till the expected last date of 24 August 2024. Students are advised to check the eligibility, important points, and admission criteria before filling out the online forms. Applicants whose name appear in the merit list have to appear for counseling and document verification round. For any additional information please visit the GU’s official website.

GU PG Admission 2024

Various postgraduate level courses offered by the Gauhati University through distance mode are MSc in Information Technology, MA in Assamese, Education, Political Science, and English, and MCom. Postgraduate programs generally last for 2 years spread across 4 semesters. The admission for several PG programs has already started and the last date to enroll is 24 August 2024*.

Admission to this specific program is offered to students who have a bachelor’s degree in any discipline from a recognized university. A registration fee of INR 550 is required to be paid at the time of admission. The academic fee for all postgraduate courses lies between INR 20000 to INR 58000.

Registration Fee in Gauhati University:

Gauhati University offers admission to candidates who have qualified for the eligibility criteria. Students are suggested to fill out the application form correctly and submit all the documents required. A registration fee of INR 550 needs to be paid along with the application form. The amount deposited at the time of registration is non-refundable.

Required Document List:

While filling out the form, candidates will have to upload the following important documents required for admission at the GU:

Students scanned passport size photographs.

Students scanned signature

Copy of Identity proof (PAN, Adhar card, voter ID)

Students birth certificate

A scanned copy of the 10th certificate

A scanned copy of the 12th certificate

A scanned copy of the UG certificate

Students migration certificate

Students caste certificate (if required)

Gauhati University Distance Education Eligibility Criteria:

Those students who wish to apply for a postgraduate program through distance mode at Gauhati University have to hold a degree in any specialization with minimum aggregate marks.

Applicants have to submit all the documents needed at the time of admission.

GU does not set any age restriction for students who want to enroll in any PG-level programs.
